content: {A烦恼}Also, if you ever spot any of the goods I've hidden around the place, be sure to let me know, pretty please! Now then... care to see what I've got today?
info: 开始营业-格连_主流程文本

content: Rule One of "The Business Practitioner's Guide": {A喜欢}"The more freebies, the more customers."
info: 开始营业-格连_主流程文本

content: Try using the <style=Highlight>shovel to dig holes</style> and plant flower seeds, and they'll bloom the following day. <style=SizeSmall>A piece of furniture made out of fresh flower petals would be a huge hit...</style>
info: 开始营业-格连_主流程文本
开始营业-格连_主流程文本

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, welcome! {A笑哈哈}Glenn's Stall is now open! <style=SizeSmall>Great! Our planet has taken another great step forward.</style>
info: 开始营业-格连_主流程文本

content: {A灵光一现}Collecting a wide range of different flowers is not only great for crafting furniture—you might even attract butterflies and other insects...
info: 开始营业-格连_主流程文本

content: And, and! You're saving 1,200 Dough for a house, right? {A看我的}You can <style=Highlight>sell</style> me some things to trade for <style=Highlight>Dough</style>!
info: 开始营业-格连_主流程文本

content: We get new stock in every day, like these <style=Highlight>flower seeds</style>—fresh and in season. Sounds like a great time to try your hand at gardening, huh?
info: 开始营业-格连_主流程文本
开始营业-格连_主流程文本

content: As a thank-you for your first visit to my shop...{短暂停} I'd like you to have this <style=Highlight>Park Bench</style>! It'll make a great addition to any outdoor area and comes in handy whenever you need a rest!
info: 开始营业-格连_主流程文本

content: From now on, I'll stock up on all sorts of daily necessities, like furniture, clothes, and food, all available for purchase with <style=Highlight>Dough</style>.
info: 开始营业-格连_主流程文本

content: Hold on! You bought flower seeds, so... <style=SizeSmall>Oh, which box did I... ah, here it is!</style> Please take this <style=Highlight>shovel</style>. It's an essential tool for gardening!
info: 开始营业-格连_主流程文本

content: Stuff like <style=Highlight>materials</style> you've gathered, <style=Highlight>creatures</style> you've caught, or {A害羞挠头}<style=Highlight>furniture</style> you've crafted... bring them to me and sell for some Dough. Even if you don't sell, it's fun just to check the prices!
info: 开始营业-格连_主流程文本
